text: Requiring love from a shepherd and King Solomon, the Shulammite does not doubt. Some foolish, romantically drunk, would have chosen the shepherd and, after the honeymoon, would have started dreaming of King Solomon. That golden dream would end up ruining her life with the shepherd. But the Shulammite went to king Solomon, and when she dreamed of the shepherd, the dream of you, bread and onions, made her proud in her own eyes. FIN
title: Las vírgenes prudentes
author: Marco Denevi
